page.title: 13DANCE AND FITNESS CENTRE
page.content: STEP-UP STUDIOS is a centre for dance and {fitness}.It has been open for 2 years and provides many kinds of dance and {exercise}classes including Keep Fit,Aerobics,Yoga,Drama,Tap,Jazz,Balle t,Modern,Body-Popping,Break,Fame,Conte mporary and classes for pre-school children.The ages of the members range from 2 years to 75 and over 2000 people attend.90% of the people who go to the studio are female and the majority attend after their working day.There are 17 teachers working there and they are all qualified,some gaining their qualifications in America.There is also a juice and salad bar{wholesome,low calorie}for anyone who is hungry after their exercises.Some people attend in order to lose weight,but most attend to {enjoy}themselves.
